reviews.review_msg: He is a great prof! Sometimes he can go off topic but otherwise really good as he is approachable and willing to answer questions.
funny and gives good examples that back up the material. is giving us a pizza party on the last day. shoutout ray zhang

A bit disorganized, but he is very effective at synthesizing the textbook information and providing lots of relevant examples during lectures. if you take him, go to class! he's a pretty chill dude too.

Ray is a nice person, but his class is very unorganized. There is a presentation worth quite a significant chunk of your grade, yet no criteria or rubric was provided for it. The guidelines (e.g., how long it should be) for the presentation were sent out with less than 24 hours' notice before the presentation date.
